tweet: Know someone in your community who embodies the Golden Rule every day? Share their story using the hashtag #GoldenRuleAward to nominate them for our next presentation.

When Ricardo Castillo of Lake County learned the women who harassed him at his job were struggling financially, he started a GoFundMe account to help. For his demonstration of the power of forgiveness, I’m presenting him with the first #GoldenRuleAward. pic.twitter.com/Vpm1CkM7hD

Greatly moved by stories of hope from researchers and surgeons at Tampa Bay’s own @LionsEyeInst – granting the miracle of sight to thousands of visually-impaired! Thanks to all staff, volunteers, and donors for paying it forward – the #GoldenRule at work! pic.twitter.com/KBLhj7TRSj
